name: 혼돈의 수정
description: 세계는 원래 마법과 결속된 곳이었지만, 대숙청 이후 모든 게 무너졌습니다. 수백 년이 지난 현재 문명은 산발적으로 맥을 이어가고 있으며 자연이 도시를 재점령했고 마법은 프리즘 수정의 형태로 돌아왔습니다. 프리즘 수정이 무차별적으로 확산되는 가운데, 수정의 힘을 안전하게 사용하는 사람이 있는가 하면 수정의 유혹에 넘어가 장악당하는 자도 있습니다. 이렇게 프리즘 전쟁의 서막이 올랐습니다.

wikiSkinData.lore: Ashe's retreat from her northern homeland was not due to any invasion, but the Prismae Crystals. In such a harsh environment, their power was difficult to resist, leading many to lose their minds and bodies to its magic. Forced to find shelter in the south, Ashe now gathers an army to take back her home from the monsters that overrun it.

Leona knows what caused the purge: blasphemy. Magic's disappearance was retribution for humanity's arrogance and misuse of it. As a worshipper of the Prismae Crystals, she believes it's her sacred duty to protect them. But she also prays to them in secret, hoping they'll bring back her lost love, Diana, who disappeared after journeying to the north.

When the Prismae Crystals began to appear, everyone on Motus reacted differently. Locked to their island, Taliyah's people viewed them not as a threat, but as an extension of nature. Now in symbiotic harmony with the crystals on their bodies, Taliyah's people are stronger than ever, and she ventures to the mainland to put her powers to the test.
